casebody.data:
In the Matter of STATE LINE TELEPHONE COMPANY, Inc., Bankrupt. Paul Schmid, Appellant. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 2, 1924.) No. 357. Appeal from the District Court of the United States foi* the Southern District of New York. Holley & Oxenberg, of New York City (M. J. Holley, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Robert P. Levis, of New York City, for respondent Wilson.

Before HOUGH, MANTON, and MAYER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed in open court.
